## Daily Return ï¼ˆæ—¥æ”¶ç›Šç‡ï¼‰

\begin{equation}
\text{daily return} = \frac{p_t - p_{t-1}}{p_{t-1}} = \frac{p_t}{p_{t-1}} - 1
\end{equation}

æ ¹æ®ä»¥ä¸Šå…¬å¼ï¼Œç”¨è°ƒæ•´åä»·æ ¼è®¡ç®—æ—¥æ”¶ç›Šç‡ï¼š

```{r}

  arrange(date) %>% 
  mutate(ret = adjusted / lag(adjusted) - 1) %>% 
  select(symbol, date, ret)
returns
```
